name: To create new booking using cucumber Data Table

testSteps.description: 1: To create new booking using cucumber Data Table ({firstname=John, lastname=Smith, totalprice=1440, depositpaid=true, checkin=2017-06-06, checkout=2017-06-16, additionalneeds=Breakfast})

children.description: Given user has access to endpoint "/booking" of Booking API

When user creates a booking
| firstname | lastname | totalprice | depositpaid | checkin | checkout | additionalneeds |
| John | Smith | 1440 | true | 2017-06-06 | 2017-06-16 | Breakfast |
Create booking: {"firstname":"John","lastname":"Smith","totalprice":1440,"depositpaid":true,"bookingdates":{"checkin":"2017-06-06","checkout":"2017-06-16"},"additionalneeds":"Breakfast"}
POST https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/auth

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given user has access to endpoint "/booking" of Booking API
When user creates a booking
Then user should get the response code 200 for creating a booking
And user verifies the booking of user: "<firstname>" "<lastname>" is created

scenarioOutline:
Given user has access to endpoint "/booking" of Booking API
When user creates a booking
|firstname | lastname | totalprice | depositpaid | checkin | checkout | additionalneeds|
|<firstname> | <lastname> | <totalprice> | <depositpaid> | <checkin> | <checkout> | <additionalneeds>|
